directed by Sean McNamara
Dennis Quaid, AnnaSophia Robb and Helen Hunt

Soul Surfer tells the true story of a young surfer Bethany Hamilton, her
arm in a shark attack a lost. She fought back bravely and against all odds
She was champion again. She was an inspiration to millions of people worldwide
by her unwavering determination and her faith intact.
